description:
TPO/2008/0483 
Rear garden: T1 Weeping Ash x 1 (Fraxinus 'Pendula')  - Lift the canopy to 2.1m all around; reduce all aspects of the crown by 0.5m; crown thin by 15%, remove all deadwood and shape.
Front garden (over Carriageway): T2	Sycamore x 1 (Acer pseudoplatanus) - Reduce to previous points of reduction approx. 2m leaving furnishing growth; remove all deadwood and leave a natural outline.
Neighbours front garden: T3	Purple leaf Plum x 1 (Prunus cerasifera 'Nigra') - Reduce all round by up 1m; clean out crown.
Front garden: T4 Cedar x 1 - Thin crown by approx. 20%; reduce all round by up to 1m to shape; lift all round by approx. 1m; removing lowest pendulous branch to main stem.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
